remarks: In a distributive lattice, meets distribute over joins.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 30-Jan-2015.)
statement:
isdlat.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
isdlat.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
isdlat.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
dlatmjdi $p |- ( ( K e. DLat /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) ) -> ( X ./\ ( Y .\/ Z ) ) = ( ( X ./\ Y ) .\/ ( X ./\ Z ) ) ) $.
